WorkItem.Description: As was mentioned in the discussion thread here http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=235494 I think we need to have VS2010 templates created/updated for PrismV4.  Just added the item here for better tracking for the application team.

Comments.Message:
Hi,

For those concerned with this subject, I believe you could find the Prism 4 templates created by David Hill useful:
 - Prism Template Pack 1.4: Now with MEF Support! (http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dphill/archive/2011/03/04/prism-template-pack-1-4-now-with-mef-support.aspx)

However, take into account that, as far as I know, there is no official support for the aforementioned templates.

We are leaving this work item open as a suggestion so that the Prism team considers this for a future release

Regards,

Damian Cherubini
http://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
Any news on some official item templates for Prism 4.1?
